name: 2022 9th International Conference on Bioinformatics Research and Applications
content: Paper Publication: Previously, the papers of ICBRA have been published in International Conference Proceedings by ACM, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus since 2017\. 1\. ICBRA 2022 papers will be published in ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9686-8), will be included in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, submitted to be indexed by CPCI. 2\. Special Issue: Journal of Integrative Bioinformatics (SCImago: Q3) - Indexed by PubMed, EI Compendex, EBSCO, Google Scholar, SCImago (SJR), SCOPUS, DBLP Computer Science Bibliography, etc.
